title: Did Biden Say He’d ‘Develop Some Disease’ and Resign If He and Harris Disagreed?
subtitle: The president-elect’s purported joke fell flat during an interview with CNN.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Regarding what he would do if he disagreed with Vice President-elect Kamala Harris, U.S. President-elect Joe Biden said: “Like I told Barack, if I reach something where there’s a fundamental disagreement we have based on a moral principle, I’ll develop some disease and say I have to resign."
